text: Javadiyeh Metro Station is a station in line 3 of the Tehran Metro. It is located in the Javadiyeh neighbourhood of Tehran. The station has access through two long walkways, one to a local street, another to a pedestrian bridge crossing rail lines into Javadiyeh. ==References== Category:Tehran Metro stations Category:Railway stations opened in 2013 Category:2013 establishments in Iran
title: Javadiyeh Metro Station
